creator: Lenard Fieldsertsd
descriptionHtml:
CCTV Mod for Minecraft PE is a new application that will improve your classic story mode! With a new mod from the developers, you can add a CCTV camera to your home! Defeat your opponents and become the best player in the pixel universe! Download addons - improve your gameplay!

The cube world is a popular VR, where each user can fulfill themselves and make their dreams come true! There are no prohibitions or restrictions like in most video games! It depends only on you how the fate of your character will turn. You can build houses, fight rivals, hunt, explore different locations, or just have fun in the pixel universe. You can do it alone or with friends while playing online. Kids enjoy absolute freedom, while adults forget about problems in real life and have fun!

The developers constantly surprise sandbox fans with a variety of novelties. This time it's a pocket edition CCTV camera mod! If you have built a gorgeous castle, tall building, villa or unique house, and you are worried about safety, you can install a camera! Watch what is happening around your building! A high-quality, realistic HD picture is waiting for you. Tell your friends about the new product, help them defend themselves from rivals! This add-on will be interesting for boys and for girls.

Also, do not forget that other addons are available to you. Use maps to expand your boundaries and add interesting locations. Skins will transform your character! You can try on the role of the hero of your favorite movie, cartoon or even anime. Use every opportunity to make your gameplay more intense and interesting!

To be the coolest and most advanced player, don't miss a single app or update. Watch videos of popular youtubers, where they talk about the latest news. You can find more useful information on the wiki. Share your life hacks with other users, help newbies get used to the pixel universe!

CCTV Mod for Minecraft pe DISCLAIMER: NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG. All rights reserved. All files available for download in this application are provided under a free distribution license. We do not claim copyright or intellectual property in any way. According to http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

The subscription can be renewed automatically:

* For 3 days, use the free trial period, which will begin after confirmation of the payment. This time is not charged.

The subscription automatically renews for a week for $ 29.99 after the end of the trial period.

* Payment is charged to your Google Account after purchase with confirmation

* App subscription automatically renews when the trial period ends

* You can turn off the app yourself and manage your subscriptions in your account settings after making a purchase.

* Any unused time of the free period will be forfeited when purchasing a premium subscription during the trial period.

All personal data is processed in accordance with the terms of the privacy policy. More details can be found here: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481?co=GENIE.Platform%3DAndroid&hl=en_US
